DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect 12-week treatment two dos tiotropium bromide ( 2.5 mcg q.d . 5 mcg q.d . ) compare placebo administer via Respimat device lung function patient Cystic Fibrosis . The selection optimal dose base bronchodilator efficacy , safety evaluation pharmacokinetic evaluation
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy 12-wk Treatment With Two Doses Tiotropium Respimat Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Male female patient 2 . Diagnosis Cystic Fibrosis ( positive sweat chloride test two identifiable mutation ) 3 . Prebronchodilator FEV1 greater/equal 25 % predict value Exclusion criterion : 1 . Significant history allergy/hypersensitivity 2 . Hypersensitivity study drug 3 . Participation another trial 4 . Female patient pregnant lactate 5 . Female patient childbearing potential 6 . Patients start new medication CF within 4 week screen 7 . Patients know substance abuse 8 . Clinically significant disease CF
